#summary an application of a tool.

= Build Action <font size="1">[http://code.google.com/p/prebake/source/browse/trunk/code/src/org/prebake/service/plans/Action.java (src)]</font> =

An action is a step in a recipe that involves running a [ToolFile tool].  Actions are created in plan files by invoking a tool file wrapper, e.g.
{{{
tools.gcc(
    /* inputs */  [ 'src/foo/*.cc', 'includes///**.h', ... ],
    /* outputs */ [ 'lib/foo/*.o', ... ],
    /* options */ { "-O": 2 });
}}}

Each [ToolFile tool file] appears as a method of the `tools` object with the signature {{{function myTool(inputGlobs, outputGlobs, options)}}}.  Calling a tool method creates an action.

[PlanFile Plan files] bundle actions into [Product products] by defining a [YSON Î›SON] object like
{{{
({
  myProduct1: { actions: [ tools.myTool('inputs/*', 'outputs/*', {option: value}),
  myProduct2: ...
})
}}}
